channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside the Yorkshire Grey, 30th December
item.description:
Damaged to kerb was reported and has not been fixed. Metal bollard and kerb have come off and are a hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Gray's Inn Road, Holborn, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Lime Bikes, 30th December
item.description:
Greenwich area around Maze Hill towards Greenwich Market is strewn with abandoned Lime bikes. It's quite an eyesore. Is something being down about the number of abandoned bikes.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bardsley Lane, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti sprayed on Electric Vehicle machine and street boxes along Stockwell Road SW9 OTZ outside Morant House, 30th December
item.description:
I like to report an influx of graffiti along Stockwell Road SW9. The graffiti is very visible at residential flat entries and lower section of walls. Also on street boxes along the stretch. Electric vehicle charging points especially outside 25 Morant house on the main road. Please could the graffiti be removed. The graffiti has been there for approximately three weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Road, Stockwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gas canisters dumped at side of road, 30th December
item.description:
A number of gas canisters dumped at side of the road. Could they be collected please.

item.title: Trees need pruning in Hayden’s Close, 30th December
item.description:
About 5 -6 trees in Hayden’s Close need pruning from house number 5 to number 12 - these have not been pruned for a while now thx

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haydens Close, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Gas canisters dumped at entrance to Bexley playing field, 30th December
item.description:
Gas canisters have been dumped on left hand side and right hand side of Riverside Road and at the entrance to the field. Could these be collected please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Riverside Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Dumped mattress, 30th December
item.description:
This mattress has been fly tipped, potentially by 5 King Edward’s Road. It has been sitting there for over a month.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): King Edwards Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Small gas canisters, 30th December
item.description:
Five or six gas canisters dumped at the side of the road. Could they be collected please. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Parsonage Lane, North Cray, Greater London

item.title: Fly tipped broken sofas and bin bags, 30th December
item.description:
The mattresses (dumped on Xmas Eve!) have been taken away but the furniture is still there and fly tippers have added to it. Location is near 1 Lavers Road next to the electricity box close to the junction with Chesholm Road. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chesholm Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Arden Close: part of a bed(?) and a black sack of rubbish., 30th December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redbourne Drive, Greater London

item.title: Flytipping, 30th December
item.description:
Ongoing issue with flytipping in the Irish Traveller Community in Abbey Close, off Rendlesham Road. It looks disgusting and Hackney Council don't seem to get to grips with this ongoing problem.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rendlesham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
